system.effect: Once per 24 hours, allows Void Shields to automatically reactivate after overloading. Poor Craftsmanship reduces their strength by 1 when reactivated. Good allows three reactivations, Best only allows one reactivation, but increase stength of void shields by 1 at all times. Only one per vessel.
